name: Bionicos (Mexican Fruit Bowls)
author: Yoly
summary: Bionicos are tasty fruit bowls, drizzled with crema - a combination of yogurt, sweetened condensed milk, and Mexican crema. Any seasonal fresh fruit can be used. They originated in street food carts in Guadalajara, Mexico, and are commonly topped with shredded coconut, raisins, and granola.
directions: Mix yogurt, sweetened condensed milk, and crema in a bowl
Add vanilla extract and stir until well incorporated
Divide cantaloupe, papaya, apple, and banana among 4 individual bowls, arranging them in separate sections
Place strawberries in the center of each bowl
Top each bowl with 1/8 cup each granola, raisins, and coconut
Drizzle 1/4 cup of the crema mixture over each fruit bowl
